content: *planning a big night out put on this playfully chic coverup and make a grand entrance lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 40100 skill level intermediate level 3 * mc homespun® article #790 3 balls *edwardian* * cc1 cc2 fun fur® article #320 2 colors 3 balls each *hot pink black* crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm split ring stitch markers work with 1 strand each of cc 1 and cc2 held together for collar body and ties are worked with 1 strand of mc *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
